
generate_f90_types(src/MAP_Registry.txt MAP_Types.f90 -ccode)

file(GLOB MAP_CLIB_SOURCES src/*.c src/*.cc src/*/*.c src/*/*.cc)
file(GLOB MAP_C_HEADERS src/*.h src/*/*.h)

add_library(mapcpplib ${MAP_CLIB_SOURCES} MAP_Types.f90)
target_include_directories(mapcpplib PUBLIC
  src/bstring src/cminpack src/lapack src/simclist ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

add_library(maplib
  src/map.f90

  # Autogenerated files
  MAP_Types.f90
  )
target_link_libraries(maplib mapcpplib nwtclibs)

install(TARGETS maplib
  RUNTIME DESTINATION lib
  ARCHIVE DESTINATION lib
  LIBRARY DESTINATION lib)

install(FILES
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/MAP_Types.h
  DESTINATION include)
